eval_prompt: I want you to teach me the disadvantages of social media according to my personal information like age, level of education, & culture.
Please teach me what are some disadvantages of using social media in an interactive manner by considering my age, educational level, & culture.
Please teach me the disadvantages of social media considering my age, level of education, and culture in an interactive manner. Doing this, try to be more interactive by asking me questions.
